snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Wednesday's selections include efforts to diversify South by Southwest and the Federal Bureau of Investigation getting a warrant for Google to...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Wednesday's selections include efforts to diversify South by Southwest and the Federal Bureau of Investigation getting a warrant for Google to unlock the Android phone of a suspect.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Faces Machines See, and Leaving Google
